verses.text: To-day the Savior calls! Ye wanderers, come! O ye benighted souls, Why longer roam?
To-day the Savior calls! Oh! listen now; Within these sacred walls, To Jesus bow.
To-day the Savior calls! For mercy flee; For all the guilty calls; Must guilty be.
To-day the Savior calls! For refuge fly; The storm of vengeance falls; Him is nigh.
